languages.text:
Psyber Raven has +25 Willpower
On starting {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g}, all enemies in the area move 1 tile towards the Psyber Raven and must succeed at WIL (+20) test or become {g|f:866cb491aeda45869e40a9165447a7cc}Staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Psyber Raven has +25 Willpower
On starting {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g}, all enemies in the area move 1 tile towards the Psyber Raven and must succeed at WIL (+20) test or become {g|f:866cb491aeda45869e40a9165447a7cc}Staggered{/g}.

languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Псайберворон получает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} противники в 4 клетках от псайберворона перемещаются на 1 клетку к псайберворону. Они выполняют проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлены{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The psyber-raven gains +25 Willpower.
At the start of the Overseer's turn, the enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower resistance test with a +20 bonus or become staggered.

The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar, anında ruhsiber kuzguna doğru 1 hücre hareket ederler. Ayrıca +20 bonusa sahip bir İrade {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidirler. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallarlar{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun +25 İrade niteliği kazanır.
Gözetmen'in turu başladığında ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar, anında ruhsiber kuzguna doğru 1 hücre hareket ederler. Ayrıca +20 bonusa sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidirler. Aksi takdirde afallarlar.

Ruhsiber kuzgun +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar, anında ruhsiber kuzguna doğru 1 hücre hareket ederler. Ayrıca +20 bonusa sahip bir İrade {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidirler. Aksi takdirde afallarlar.

languages.text:
El psicocuervo recibe +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, los enemigos situados en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo se mueven inmediatamente 1 casilla hacia el psicocuervo y deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad con una bonificación de +20 para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrados{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El psicocuervo recibe +25 de Voluntad.
Al comienzo del turno del supervisor, los enemigos situados en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo se mueven inmediatamente 1 casilla hacia el psicocuervo y deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una bonificación de +20 para no quedar desequilibrados.

languages.text:
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高25点。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，距离生化渡鸦4格内所有敌人会立刻向生化渡鸦的方向移动1格。此外，所有敌人都需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
生化渡鸦的意志提高25点。
监察官的回合开始时，距离生化渡鸦4格内所有敌人会立刻向生化渡鸦的方向移动1格。此外，所有敌人都需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入恐慌状态。

languages.text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Zu Beginn der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} bewegen sich alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben sofort 1 Feld auf den Psitech-Rabe zu und müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 auf Willenskraft bestehen, sonst geraten sie ins {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumeln{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +25 Willenskraft.
Zu Beginn der Runde des Aufsehers bewegen sich alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben sofort 1 Feld auf den Psitech-Rabe zu und müssen eine Widerstandsprobe mit einem Bonus von +20 auf Willenskraft bestehen, sonst geraten sie ins Taumeln.

languages.text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +25.
Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille se rapprochent immédiatement de 1 case de la psyber-corneille et doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Force mentale avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de Force mentale de +25.
Au début du tour du surveillant, les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille se rapprochent immédiatement de 1 case de la psyber-corneille et doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet Sidération.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}は+25される。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、サイバーレイヴンの半径4セルの敵は即座にサイバーレイヴンに向かって1セル移動し、+20のボーナスで意志力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態となる。

The psyber-raven gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven immediately move 1 cell toward the psyber-raven and must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+25される。
監督者のターン開始時、サイバーレイヴンの半径4セルの敵は即座にサイバーレイヴンに向かって1セル移動し、+20のボーナスで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗するとよろけ状態となる。

サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+25される。
監督者のターン開始時、サイバーレイヴンの半径4セルの敵は即座にサイバーレイヴンに向かって1セル移動し、+20のボーナスで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗するとよろけ状態となる。

В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} противники в 4 клетках от псайберворона перемещаются на 1 клетку к псайберворону. traits.locale_text:
Псайберворон получает +25 к Воле.
В начале хода надзирателя противники в 4 клетках от псайберворона перемещаются на 1 клетку к псайберворону. Они выполняют проверку Воли на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала оказываются ошеломлены.

Псайберворон получает +25 к Воле.
В начале хода надзирателя противники в 4 клетках от псайберворона перемещаются на 1 клетку к псайберворону. Они выполняют проверку Воли на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала оказываются ошеломлены.
